/usr/bin/c++    -fpermissive -fPIC -pthread -pipe -DLINUX -D_BOOL -DREQUIRE_IOSTREAM -Wno-deprecated -fno-gnu-keywords -w     CMakeFiles/run.dir/ex_MaxSubArray.cpp.o CMakeFiles/run.dir/Run.cpp.o CMakeFiles/run.dir/Kernels/./run_generated_cuExternsTest.cu.o  -o run -rdynamic /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart.so -lcuda /home/sam/NVIDIA_GPU_Computing_SDK/C/lib/libcutil_x86_64.a /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart.so -lcuda /home/sam/NVIDIA_GPU_Computing_SDK/C/lib/libcutil_x86_64.a -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/cuda/lib64
